# Resource: okta_app_oauth_redirect_uri





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_id` (String) OAuth application ID.
- `uri` (String) Redirect URI to append to Okta OIDC application.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
